ce1975df-1b09-47a2-862e-beaba12343ac.name: Bloodlust

762c22e6-a624-4170-95a9-6c488b3a25fc.name: Cowardice
762c22e6-a624-4170-95a9-6c488b3a25fc.notes: Make a self-control roll any time you are called on to risk physical danger. Roll at -5 if you must risk death.
